structure.unit: PUBLIC PRINTING AND DISTRIBUTION OF PUBLIC DOCUMENTS

law.catch_line: Printing for political subdivisions to be done within such subdivision.
law.text: All printing for which any county, city or other political subdivision of the Commonwealth is chargeable, or which is paid for with funds appropriated wholly or in part by any such county, city or political subdivision, must be printed within such county, city or political subdivision, where practicable.
